card_text: If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of "Parallel eXceed", its Level becomes 4 and its original ATK/DEF become halved. You can only use each of the following effects of "Parallel eXceed" once per turn.$N●If you Link Summon: You can Special Summon this card from your hand to your zone that Link Monster points to.$N●If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Parallel eXceed" from your Deck.
